front.title: Datagram Transport Layer Security for Stream Control Transmission Protocol

abstract.t: This document describes the usage of the Datagram Transport LayerSecurity (DTLS) protocol over the Stream Control TransmissionProtocol (SCTP).The user of DTLS over SCTP can take advantage of all featuresprovided by SCTP and its extensions, especially support ofo multiple streams to avoid head of line blocking.o multi-homing to provide network level fault tolerance.o unordered delivery.o partial reliable data transfer.
